March 9, 1991 D Midlands (North) Area (Championship Section)
Midlands (North) Area (Championship Section) 100 Test Piece Contest Midlands Area north-midlands-area-championship-section National Championship of Great Britain (Championship Section Final)
Midlands
Championship
Journey into Freedom
Royal Concert Hall, Nottingham, Nottinghamshire, England, UK Desford did not compete at the Regional Contest as they were currently Hat-Trick Champions and after a year of exclusion they were automatically invited to the finals.
Venue originally listed as Nottingham Playhouse, but feedback received that a contest has never taken place there. Information taken from contest programme and British Bandsman 4613
April 6, 2011, 10:42 p.m. Jan. 23, 2013, 4:16 p.m.
